name: ComixPlay #1: The Endless Incident
description: ComixPlay: The Endless Incident is a 124 page digital graphic novel where you can play the heroes in turn-based combat
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP SP2 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP SP2 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
